name: Firemen's Pension Fund, Appellant, v. Harrisburg et al.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Firemen’s Pension Fund, Appellant, v. Harrisburg et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge J. Paul Rupp.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: George L. Reed, with him George I. Puhalc, for appellant.
John Mcl. Smith, for intervening appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Firemen’s Pension Fund, Appellant, v. Harrisburg et al.
Argued May 26, 1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
George L. Reed, with him George I. Puhalc, for appellant.
Spencer G. Hall, for appellee.
John Mcl. Smith, for intervening appellee.
June 24, 1949:
